_Mark Newhouse_: CSS Design: Taming Lists[1]. “I'll demonstrate how to 
use CSS to bring unwieldy lists under control. It's time for you to tell lists 
how to behave, instead of letting them run wild on your web page.”



[1] http://www.alistapart.com/stories/taminglists/
